job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building solutions, with an emphasis on leveraging AI to achieve this. It aligns with integrating AI into product development.

job_tasks.phrase: Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
job_tasks.justification: This describes traditional software development tasks focused on feature creation and system integration within a specific product (Jive).

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on developing user experiences and optimizing activities, which are software development tasks, even though it mentions data and analytics.

job_tasks.phrase: Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the outcome of software development (providing insights and a customer view) rather than the core AI model development itself.

job_tasks.phrase: navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the task of integrating AI solutions into existing product lines, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of applications and features using cloud-native technologies, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This describes using AI tools to enhance the software development process itself, rather than developing AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on modernizing products using AI-driven innovations, which implies integrating AI into the software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of back-end software development and deployment using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and collaboration are standard software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions enhancing product functionality by integrating AI-driven solutions, a core software engineering task.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly refers to collaboration with a global team.

soft_skills.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights collaboration as a key aspect of ensuring quality and standards.

soft_skills.phrase: eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions
soft_skills.justification: The term 'eager' implies a willingness to learn and adapt to new ways of working with AI.
This implies a drive for innovation and creating new solutions.
Directly points to innovation as a key aspect of the role.
Explicitly states the need for innovation.
Highlights innovation specifically driven by AI.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as developing features, integrating solutions, building back-end services, and conducting code reviews. While it mentions leveraging AI and AI-driven innovations, it does not describe core AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG implementation. The primary focus is on using AI as a tool to enhance existing software products and the development process, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role. It explicitly states the focus on software engineering tasks enhanced by AI, and the absence of core AI model development. The responsibilities and the 'What you will NOT be doing' section clearly delineate the scope, making the classification straightforward.
